quest.496903AB7E8A0A92.title: &fWelcome to &6Iron's Gems \&\ Jewelry&f!
quest.496903AB7E8A0A92.quest_desc1: &6Iron's Jems \&\ Jewelry&r is a mod that focus on combining materials and &bJewels&r to provide the player with special effects or stat increases.
quest.496903AB7E8A0A92.quest_desc3: You will need to craft a &aJewelcrafting Station&r to begin making some basic &bJewelry&r.
quest.496903AB7E8A0A92.quest_desc5: To learn more advanced &bJewelry&r, you will need to find their blueprints by exploring the world.
quest.496903AB7E8A0A92.quest_desc7: Most &bJewelry&r consists of a &aBand Material&r and a &aGem&r.
quest.496903AB7E8A0A92.quest_desc10: &e&lNOTE&r: This questline only covers some of the basic use-cases for items. There are over two-thousand possible combinations, so it is advisable that you test things out and experiment to see what you like best.
chapter.143441998FF2D8BD.title: Iron's Jewelry

quest.3900E67C8B833980.title: &fArtisan Scrolls
quest.3900E67C8B833980.quest_desc1: &aArtisan Scrolls&r can be found while exploring the world
quest.3900E67C8B833980.quest_desc3: To learn a &bJewel&r blueprint simply right-click with an &aArtisan Scroll&r in hand.
task.1E99CDD9919D994A.title: Jeweler
quest.2F6F52B669C50A01.title: &fSharpshooter's Loop
quest.2F6F52B669C50A01.quest_desc1: The &aSharpshooter's Loop&r is a &bRing&r that applies a gem's on-hit effects whenever an arrow hits an enemy.
quest.79A7540F94A2183E.title: &fAmulet of Protection
quest.79A7540F94A2183E.quest_desc1: The &aAmulet of Protection&r applies a gem's on-hit effects whenever the player is struck by an enemy.
quest.0F184788499005C6.title: &fStalwart Ring
quest.0F184788499005C6.quest_desc1: The &aStalwart Ring&r applies effects whenever the player blocks with a shield.
quest.0F184788499005C6.quest_desc3: The effect changes based on the Banding:
quest.368CF829E37E0945.title: &fBarbed Band
quest.368CF829E37E0945.quest_desc1: The &aBarbed Band&r significantly amplifies the &bBanding Material&r effect but deals damage to the player whenever the player attacks.
quest.368CF829E37E0945.quest_desc3: All &aGems&r cab be used to amplify the effects of the &aBanding&r with the following multipliers:
quest.4929927157D97BFC.title: &fImproved Gemset Ring
quest.4929927157D97BFC.quest_desc1: The &aImproved Gemset Ring&r has a x1.5 base effect multiplier, which stacks with the &aBanding Material&r quality.
quest.2461B0DCE15C5BCE.title: &fSuperior Gemset Ring
quest.2461B0DCE15C5BCE.quest_desc1: The &aSuperior Gemset Ring&r has a two gem slots.
quest.2461B0DCE15C5BCE.quest_desc3: The first has a base multiplier of x0.875, while the second has a x1.75 base multiplier.
quest.2461B0DCE15C5BCE.quest_desc5: These base multipliers stack with &aBanding Material&r quality multipliers.
quest.2461B0DCE15C5BCE.quest_desc7: The same gem can be slotted into both slots, providing an effective x2.625 base multiplier.
quest.65523A9928B0AF3E.title: &fTearstone Ring
quest.65523A9928B0AF3E.quest_desc1: The &aTearstone Ring&r provides an immunity buff depending on what gem is slotted.
quest.6B0731EE1A55A7F0.title: &fAmethyst Shard
quest.0C9AF68E6C9CF4CA.title: &fDiamond
quest.4F1F2AA921441924.title: &fPrismarine Shard
quest.117131CF7E2FE2DE.title: &fLapis Lazuli
quest.61FBB8F1E0BB7189.title: &fEmerald
quest.61FBB8F1E0BB7189.quest_desc3: &bOn-hit Effect&r: Chance to Create Emerald Items
quest.26D7C5298D95C69A.title: &fBanding Materials
quest.26D7C5298D95C69A.quest_desc1: When crafting &bJewelry&r, &aBanding Materials&r can be used by themselves to grant effects and/or stat increases.
quest.26D7C5298D95C69A.quest_desc3: Their main use, however, is to multiply &aGems&r effects with their quality multiplier.
task.574369B60421C9FF.title: Banding Materials
quest.2F2DC018DD6A2A23.title: &fGems
quest.2F2DC018DD6A2A23.quest_desc1: &aGems&r are the part of most &bJewelry&r that grants effects.
quest.2F2DC018DD6A2A23.quest_desc3: Different pieces of &bJewelry&r are affected by &aGems&r in different ways, so be sure to check each piece carefully before crafting.
task.4B67D8495CB6403D.title: Gems
